segments.text: Hello, it is great to be back at Ignite and to talk with you all today about Microsoft 365 Copilot. We have been working hard this year to build a product you love, a product that you cannot work without.
segments.summary: The speaker expresses excitement to be at Ignite and discuss Microsoft 365 Copilot, emphasizing their team's dedication to creating an indispensable product that users will love.

segments.text: We have shipped over 400 new features. Based on your feedback. You told us to move faster. We shipped GPT 5 on the same day that it was launched. We released Researcher with computer use. You tell Copilot what to do and it gets the job done.
segments.summary: We shipped over 400 new features, including GPT-5 on launch day and Researcher with computer use, responding to your feedback to move faster. Copilot now executes tasks based on your instructions.

segments.text: And at night, we're bringing Sora 2 to the Copilot Create experience so you can bring your ideas to life and video. You told us you wanted model choice. We brought anthropic models to researcher and now they're powering more innovations that you'll see here today.
segments.summary: Sora 2 is being integrated into Copilot Create to help users bring ideas to life through video. Model choice has been expanded by adding Anthropic models to researcher, enabling further innovations.

segments.text: And as fast as we innovate, we know that the fundamentals are non negotiable. We never lose sight of what matters most, ensuring that Copilot is high performing, that it's reliable, and it's secure at the core. Today, more than 90% of the Fortune 500 use Copilot. Barclays is making banking more personal and more intuitive for their customers. DuPont is helping scientists go faster from hypothesis to breakthroughs, and Levi's is helping retail employees better serve their customers.
segments.summary: While continuing to innovate, we prioritize non-negotiable fundamentals: Copilot must be high performing, reliable, and secure. Over 90% of the Fortune 500 use Copilot, with companies like Barclays, DuPont, and Levi's leveraging it to enhance customer experiences and accelerate breakthroughs.

segments.text: Now these companies, they're not just adopting Copilot, they are reshaping their operating models with Copilot. Now the pace of AIM innovation is relentless, and so are we.
segments.summary: Companies are not just adopting Copilot; they are reshaping their operating models with it. The pace of AIM innovation is relentless, and so are we.

segments.text: We are committed to not just bringing you AI that works, we are delivering AI built for work.
segments.summary: They are focused on providing AI that functions effectively and is specifically designed for workplace applications.

segments.text: Copilot is a unified experience that brings AI and agents together. It's powered by the best models, all in the apps that your employees use every single day. And it's all secure at the core on your M365 environment.
segments.summary: Copilot is a unified experience that integrates AI and agents into the everyday apps employees use, powered by top models and secured within the M365 environment.

segments.text: We take the latest innovations and fine tune them for business so you can focus on results. So what makes Copilot AI built for work? Work IQ?
segments.summary: Copilot AI is tailored for business by refining the latest innovations to help users focus on results. Its "Work IQ" feature distinguishes it as AI specifically built for work.

segments.text: Work IQ is the intelligence layer that powers Copilot. It understands you, your job, and your company. So what does that mean? Well, let's start with data. copilot knows you at work. It knows your most important meetings and knows the files you're working on. It knows your unread emails. It knows the people you work for and the people you work with. Next is memory. Copilot knows the way you work, your style, your preferences, your habits. It also knows your workflows, like how do you handle important tasks like a customer escalation, preparing for completing an RFP, or even getting your annual review ready. And finally, there's inference. This is where Copilot puts it all together and makes connections and unlocks insights and even predicts the next best action for you.
segments.summary: Work IQ is the intelligence layer behind Copilot that understands you, your job, and your company by leveraging data, memory, and inference. It knows your meetings, files, emails, collaborators, work style, preferences, habits, and workflows. Copilot uses this understanding to make connections, unlock insights, and predict the next best actions for you.

segments.text: And it's secure. It keeps all of your data in your tenant under your control and respects all of your policies and permissions. And work IQ is built into the Microsoft 365 apps, so it creates this powerful feedback loop, right?
segments.summary: Work IQ is secure, keeping all data within your tenant and respecting your policies and permissions. It is integrated into Microsoft 365 apps, creating a powerful feedback loop.

segments.text: For Copilot, it's constantly picking up more and more signals and using them to deliver smarter, more personalized experiences. And you can also tap into Work IQ to build your own custom agents tuned to your unique work flows and business needs. Well, you may be thinking, how is Work IQ different from using other AI tools with M365 Connectors? Well, connectors only pull fragments of data with no real understanding of context and relationships, so they often miss critical information or even give incomplete answers, and worse, they may hallucinate.
segments.summary: Copilot continuously gathers signals to provide smarter, more personalized experiences, while Work IQ allows users to build custom agents tailored to specific workflows and business needs. Unlike M365 Connectors, which only pull fragmented data without understanding context or relationships, Work IQ offers deeper, more accurate insights and reduces the risk of incomplete or hallucinated answers.
Copilot does not guess work; it relies on patterns and data to generate responses.

segments.text: IQ works across all of your data in real time with full context, providing views and to valuable patterns and insights. Also, connectors do not respect your controls, adding real risk to your most valuable asset, your company's knowledge.
segments.summary: IQ analyzes all your data in real time with full context to reveal valuable patterns and insights. However, connectors may bypass your controls, posing risks to your company's knowledge assets.
